# iosxr_cef_load_balancing_8000 (Data Source)

This data source can read the CEF Load Balancing configuration on Cisco 8000 series routers.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxr_cef_load_balancing_8000" "example" {
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `platform_load_balance_fields_userdata_ipv4_non_tcp_udp` (Attributes List) none (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--platform_load_balance_fields_userdata_ipv4_non_tcp_udp))
- `platform_load_balance_fields_userdata_ipv4_tcp` (Attributes List) none (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--platform_load_balance_fields_userdata_ipv4_tcp))
- `platform_load_balance_fields_userdata_ipv4_udp` (Attributes List) none (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--platform_load_balance_fields_userdata_ipv4_udp))
- `platform_load_balance_fields_userdata_ipv6_non_tcp_udp` (Attributes List) none (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--platform_load_balance_fields_userdata_ipv6_non_tcp_udp))
- `platform_load_balance_fields_userdata_ipv6_tcp` (Attributes List) none (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--platform_load_balance_fields_userdata_ipv6_tcp))
- `platform_load_balance_fields_userdata_ipv6_udp` (Attributes List) none (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--platform_load_balance_fields_userdata_ipv6_udp))
- `platform_load_balance_hash_rotate` (Number) Router-ID is bypassed when hash rotate count is used
- `platform_load_balance_mpls_hashing_inner_non_ip_label_only` (Boolean) MPLS label stack and non-IP payload hash method to use labels only

<a id="nestedatt--platform_load_balance_fields_userdata_ipv4_non_tcp_udp"></a>
### Nested Schema for `platform_load_balance_fields_userdata_ipv4_non_tcp_udp`

Read-Only:

- `ipv4_hash_offset` (Number) zero-based offset from the end of ipv4 header
- `ipv4_hash_size` (Number) number of bytes considered in hashing
- `location_string` (String) ingress card location
